name: Simple Box Pushing Game?
description:
Are you ready to push some boxes. If yes, play this game. If no, still play the game. Just to get everything clear (game has pretty small tutorial) here is the point of game and some stuff. Dont read if u wanna experience all by yourself. 

Circle is you

Green boxes can move just on rails

Darkblue tiles are rails

Green boxes activate Buttons that are red

Buttons opens doors

Goal is portal inside open door

Grey is just wall

Black is wall that you cant go through even in lag mode

Yellow boxes can be freely moved around but they cant activate buttons

In lag mode (space) you can go through every kind of wall expect Black and Purple

Purple is wall you can go trought normally but not In lag mode 

Simple isnt it? 

This is game for WOWIEgame Jam#2. Theme was intentional bugs. It was fun project. The time started running out so game ended short. I maybe do the full release some day. Enjoy the game and if something is unclear In game pls tell me. If u wanna better contact to me, my Discord is @Tipu#1178 . Every feedback is just good.
